## PolySyncIterable.chunk() method

Return an iteration of arrays of size `num` (except possibly the last) containing groupings of elements of `this` iteration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
chunk(num?: number): PolySyncIterable<Array<T>>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

num


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Size of the chunks


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[PolySyncIterable](./polyethylene.polysynciterable.md)<!-- -->&lt;Array&lt;T&gt;&gt;

A new [PolySyncIterable](./polyethylene.polysynciterable.md) that yields arrays of size `num` (except possibly the last) containing groupings of elements of `this`

## Remarks

All chunks except possibly the last one will have exactly `num` elements. The last chunk will have less elements if the number of elements in the iteration is not divisible by `num`<!-- -->. No chunk will ever be returned empty or have more than `num` elements.
